chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (x : A) (xs xss : list A), insertion A x xs xss -> forall yss : list A, insertion A x (xs ++ yss) (xss ++ yss)

Premises:
insertion : forall A : Set, A -> list A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto
insertion_snoc : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (xs : list A), insertion A x xs (xs ++ x :: nil)
is_permutation_cons_snoc : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (xs : list A), is_permutation A (x :: xs) (xs ++ x :: nil)
insertion_permutation_eq : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l' l -> forall l'' : list A, insertion A x l'' l -> is_permutation A l' l''
insertion_trans : forall (A : Set) (l0 l1 : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l0 l1 -> forall (l2 : list A) (y : A), insertion A y l1 l2 -> exists l3 : list A, insertion A y l0 l3 /\ insertion A x l3 l2
permutation_insertion_comm : forall (A : Set) (l1 l2 : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l1 l2 -> forall l4 : list A, is_permutation A l2 l4 -> exists l3 : list A, is_permutation A l1 l3 /\ insertion A x l3 l4
in_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l' : list A, insertion A x l' l
insertion_is_set : forall (A : Set) (l : list A), is_set A l -> forall x : A, ~ In x l -> forall l' : list A, insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l'
permutation_insertion : forall (A : Set) (l0 l1 : list A), is_permutation A l0 l1 -> forall (x : A) (l2 l3 : list A), insertion A x l0 l2 -> insertion A x l1 l3 -> is_permutation A l2 l3
permutation_insertion_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A), is_permutation A l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> forall l''' : list A, is_permutation A l'' l''' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l'''
permutation_insertion_aux : forall (A : Set) (l l' l'' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x l l'' -> is_permutation A l' l''
insertion_inclusion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> forall y : A, In y l -> In y l'
tail_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> insertion A x (y :: l) (y :: l')
insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> In x l'
cons_is_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A), is_permutation A l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l''
insertion_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
insertion_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : A -> list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x l (x :: l)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A x l l' -> P x l l' -> P x (y :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (y : A) (l l0 : list A), insertion A y l l0 -> P y l l0
is_set_insertion_in : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> ~ In x l
head_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), insertion A x l (x :: l)
insertion_is_permutation : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l'
is_set_insertion : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> is_set A l' -> is_set A l
is_permutation_sind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
is_permutation_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> P l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> P (x :: l) l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, is_permutation A l l0 -> P l l0
insertion_length : forall (A : Set) (l l' : list A) (x : A), insertion A x l l' -> length l' = S (length l)
in_insertion_inv : forall (A : Set) (x y : A) (l l' : list A), insertion A y l l' -> In x l' -> x = y \/ In x l
Inductive is_permutation (A : Set) : list A -> list A -> Prop := nil_is_permutation : is_permutation A nil nil | cons_is_permutation : forall l l' : list A, is_permutation A l l' -> forall (x : A) (l'' : list A), insertion A x l' l'' -> is_permutation A (x :: l) l'' Arguments is_permutation _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments nil_is_permutation _%type_scope Arguments cons_is_permutation _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope _ _ _%list_scope
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
is_set_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> P l -> ~ In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, is_set A l -> P l
in_split : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ x :: l2
